title: The Playground
subtle: Concept (nonfiction), 16 words, Level aa (Grade K), Lexile BR10L
description: What do you like to do at the playground? In the book The Playground, students will read about some of the things they may see at a playground. Students will have the opportunity to identify the author's purpose, as well as to visualize to understand text as they read. Detailed photographs and the repetition of the high-frequency word the support early emergent readers.
meta: bridge, gate, ladder, slide, swing, wheel
Initial Consonants : Discriminate initial consonant /l/ sound
Capitalization : Capitalize the beginning of sentences
High-Frequency Words : Recognize and use the high-frequency word the
